    • Method Detail

      • getWebPagePathForClass

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<java.lang.String> getWebPagePathForClass(java.lang.Class<? extends TopLevelPage> pageClass)
        Return an Optional<String> representing the path to a web page for a TopLevelPage class. The path is extracted using reflection from the WebPagePath annotation, if present.
        Parameters:
        pageClass -
        Returns:
        - the Optional<String> that is present with a value if the given Page class was annotated with WebPagePath

      • defaultPageLoadHook

        public void defaultPageLoadHook(Page page,
                                SeleniumActions a)
        Default implementation of pageLoadHook(). Just verify the page identifier Locator is present on the DOM.
        Parameters:
        page -
        a -

      • getAllSubpageFields

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Field> getAllSubpageFields(java.lang.Class<?> type)
        Use reflection to recursively get all fields annotated with SubPageField on a given class.
        Parameters:
        type -
        Returns:
        - List of Fields that are annotated with SubPageField and are of type SubPage, recursively including fields from super classes.

        public void initSubPages(Page page,
